subject: Add immediate emoji reactions to message action sheet
body:
- Extract REACTION_EMOJIS constant to shared constants/reactions.ts file
- Display emoji picker directly at top of MessageActionSheet for faster access
- Remove separate ReactionPicker modal from chat flow (still available for backward compatibility)
- Update both MessageActionSheet and ReactionPicker to use shared emoji constant
- Remove background color from reaction buttons for cleaner appearance
- Reduce reaction flow from 4 taps to 2 taps

Users can now react to messages immediately when opening the action sheet instead of navigating through an additional modal.
title: Add immediate emoji reactions to message action sheet
